name: Azzzleep
description:
This project compete for the very nice LIBGDX december jam competition "player is asleep".

H - left   
K - right
U- rotate
N-drop
J-down

R-retry
Q-Quit

I wish you will enjoy   this Tetris and Pixel art mix game!

Hint : for the pattern chose one color to make it and the grey square can be any color or empty.  

"Music by Devynn LaShure, Echo Blue Music

https://www.echobluemusic.com"
